metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13254 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Django 2.2 before 2.2.13 and 3.0 before 3.0.7.In cases where a memcached backend does not perform key validation, passingmalformed cache keys could result in a key collision, and potential dataleakage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.9
python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.9
python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.9').
